titleStmt.title: The duello or single combat from antiquitie deriued into this kingdome of England, with seuerall kindes, and ceremonious formes thereof from good authority described.
titleStmt.author: Selden, John, 1584-1654.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G[eorge] E[ld] for I. Helme, and are to be sold at his shop in Saint Dunstans Church-yard, in Fleet-streete,

notesStmt.note: Dedication signed: I.S., i.e. John Selden.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
